name: Push new package to chocolatey

on:
  workflow_dispatch:
  push:
    branches: [ "master" ]

jobs:
  push_chocolatey:
    runs-on: windows-latest
    env:
      CHOCOLATEY_MINOR_VERSION: ''
      CHOCOLATEY_API_KEY: ${{ secrets.CHOCOLATEY_API_KEY }}
    
    steps:
    
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      name: Checkout source
    
    # A new version.txt should've been created for this workflow to trigger (or manually triggered)
    - id: get_chromedriver_version
      name: Read ChromeDriver version
      run: |
        $chromeVersion = Get-Content ./version.txt     
        echo $chromeVersion
        
        # Write to GITHUB_OUTPUT, which is a file
        echo "version=$chromeVersion" | Out-File -FilePath $env:GITHUB_OUTPUT -Append -Encoding utf8

    - name: Print get_chromedriver_version step version
      run: | 
        echo "Step version: ${{ steps.get_chromedriver_version.outputs.version }} "

    - id: chocolatey_push
      name: Push to Chocolatey
      shell: pwsh
      run: |
        ./chromedriver/push-chocolatey.ps1 -apiKey $env:CHOCOLATEY_API_KEY -versionNumber ${{ steps.get_chromedriver_version.outputs.version }} -chocoMinorVersionNumber $env:CHOCOLATEY_MINOR_VERSION
